price: (10) [The one] who has made for you the earth a bed and made for you upon it roads that you might be guided
arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَهۡدٗا وَجَعَلَ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا سُبُلٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-arḍa mahdan wajaʿala lakum fīhā subulan laʿallakum tahtadūna
